data.client_settings: aur/discord 0.0.1-7(i'm unsure where else I can get my version number)
data.expected_result: no notifications from a channel which you are not allowed to be in.
data.short_description: Ability to see messages in NSFW channels while not accepting the fact that you are over 18 years of age.
data.steps_to_repro: - not accept NSFW warning(saying you are over 18 years old) 2 - don't mute notifications 3 - get notifications of chats happening in nsfw channel
